trends: There have been no other sightings in Colmesneil
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright lights constantly changing color and intensity with erratic movement.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife, her parents and i witnessed a very strange object at approximately 20:10 on saturday, february 18, 2007. the object had no discernable shape or size, but must have been somewhat large due to its apparent distance from our location, two miles west of colmesneil, tx. on highway 1745. the object was very bright white, but alternated color to blue-white, incandescent orange, and red-white in color; which constantly changed in no particular order or sequence, and continuously varied in intensity. the light intensity of this object was at least an order of magnitude higher than that of any current aircraft landing or taxi lighting system i am familiar with (an order of magnitude higher than systems reported to be 500,000 cp or more). the object was observed traveling away from our location, and the lights on this object were much more intense than landing and\or taxi lights on an approaching aircraft. in addition, the familiar blinking of aircraft position lights was not present at all. we watched the object from an initial distance of approximately 4 miles and approximately 15000 feet agl, which seemed to vary somewhat due to its erratic motion. considering the distances involved, the object���s displacements must have been significant. the object traveled away from us slowly, due east to due west, for about 35 minutes. the height agl of the object was somewhat constant (discounting the erratic motion); therefore, after 35 minutes, the object was about 16 miles away, considering an estimate of 10 degrees above the horizon. this data would also suggest an approximate ground speed of slightly over 20 mph. the most disturbing aspect of this object (and the character that caught and held my attention) was its ���amorphous��� nature. we viewed this object for over a half an hour, mostly through 16x field glasses and a high powered camera lens, and were struck by the constant change of its shape, size, color and position. considering its behavior and appearance, we could not come up with an adequate explanation for the identity of this object. the experience was disturbing for us, since we could not explain its behavior. however, if the flight path is extrapolated on a map, it does come close to ft. hood, tx. so, perhaps the object is a new military aircraft undergoing some phase of flight qualification testing?
